description: This file contains C source code implementing functionalities for processing and handling 802.1X/EAP packets in a Wi-Fi security context. It includes functions for processing EAP data, association requests/responses, authentication packets, handling timeouts, and initialization/deinitialization routines for the 802.1X module.

methods.name: void process_eap_data(wifi_8021x_data_t * data,wifi_8021x_t * module,bool new_event)
methods.description: Processes EAP data frames, handles different EAP codes like success, failure, request, response, updates counter metrics, and manages hash map entries for associated MAC addresses.

methods.name: void process_assoc_req_packet(wifi_assoc_req_data_t * assoc_data,wifi_8021x_t * module)
methods.description: Handles association request packets; currently frees associated data.

methods.name: void process_assoc_rsp_packet(wifi_assoc_rsp_data_t * assoc_data,wifi_8021x_t * module)
methods.description: Handles association response packets; currently frees associated data.

methods.name: void process_auth_packet(wifi_auth_data_t * auth_data,wifi_8021x_t * module)
methods.description: Processes authentication packets; currently frees associated data.

methods.name: void process_8021x_packet(wifi_8021x_data_t * data,wifi_8021x_t * module)
methods.description: Processes different types of 802.1X packets based on EAPOL type and directs to appropriate handlers.

methods.name: void process_8021x_data_timeout(wifi_8021x_t * module)
methods.description: Iterates through all VAPs and their stations to handle timeout events, process remaining EAPOL packets, and log statistics.

methods.name: void deinit_8021x(wifi_8021x_t * module)
methods.description: Deinitializes the 802.1X module by cleaning up hash maps and freeing allocated memory.

methods.name: int init_8021x(wifi_8021x_t * module)
methods.description: Initializes the 802.1X module by creating hash maps for each VAP.
